item.title: just_audio : An audio player plugin for Android, iOS, macOS, web, Linux and Windows.
item.description: What is just_audio Plugin for Flutter just_audio is a feature-rich audio player for Android, iOS, macOS, web, Linux and Windows. Installation Add dependency Add this to your package’s pubspec.ymal file: dependencies: just_audio: ^0.9.29 Install package from command line flutter pub add just_audio Import Package import 'package:just_audio/just_audio.dart'; Platform specific configuration Android Add the following to your AndroidManifest.xml file to enable your app to access audio files online. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> Add the following attribute to the application element if you want to connect to non-HTTPS URLs or if you employ a functionality that relies on the proxy, including headers, caching, or streaming audio sources:
